descriptionText.attr1: The Reborn are a newly formed faction, most resembling a pirate group.
After the rebellion, the MU took another hit when a big portion of the remaining rebels chose to continue the fight. Thus the Reborn were created.
Initially made up of the early settlers of this region, the Reborn's official mandate is independence and self rule. Needing resources and a way to weaken the establishment, they turned to piracy.
As more and more new recruits are taken on board, diluting the original founders, the original goals are slowly eroding away.
